doc.field: Kon' choh kon' choh dok-k'än', kon' choh kon' choh dok-k'än' xah.
Kon' choh kon' choh dok-k'än', kon' choh kon' choh dok-k'än' xah.
I want to make a big fire, so I can make a big fire.
